data.eml:eml: A new species of Tenuipalpoides (Acari: Tetranychidae) from Astragalus (Leguminoseae) in Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Latifi, Malihe (2017): A new species of Tenuipalpoides (Acari: Tetranychidae) from Astragalus (Leguminoseae) in Iran. Zootaxa 4329 (2): 150-158, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4329.2.2
